content: portland frog crochet hat by zeb walter @discofibers disco fibers is a secondhand yarn shop with a mission to make fiber arts affordable for everyone if you would like to make a donation to help us open our retail space please visit discofibers com portland frog crochet hat by zeb walter @discofibers the portland frog hat was created as a way of showing solidarity with the portland frog army you will need yarn 50g of worsted 4 weight green 10 yards worsted weight white hook 5 00 mm crochet hook notions two 1-1 5 buttons for eyes tapestry needle to weave ends half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet - yarn over insert hook yarn over pull loop through yarn over pull through all loops decrease = decrease - perform a decrease by picking up the front horizontal bars of the next two stitches yarn over and pull through both yarn over and pull through all loops to start row 1 chain 41 row 2 turn skip the first chain and half_double_crochet into the back bump of each chain 40 from here we will be working in the round notice how your half_double_crochet from row 2 have two loops on top commonly referred to as the front horizontal bar and the back horizontal bar we have 40 half_double_crochet with 2 bars each these will become the 80 stitches we create to work in the round round 1 chain 1 turn - in the first stitch you will half_double_crochet in the front horizontal bar only repeat this across the row for all 40 front horizontal bars 40 - without chaining turn your work and continue the round with half_double_crochet in the back horizontal bars of the half_double_crochet you were just working into from row 2 80 round 2-5 half_double_crochet in every stitch work in continuous rounds 80 place a stitch marker on both ends of the hat one will go at the beginning of the round right before stitch 1 the second stitch marker will be placed at the other end between stitches 40 & 41 move these markers up with every round round 6 *half_double_crochet 39 times decrease turn *repeat 78 round 7 *half_double_crochet 38 times decrease turn *repeat 76 round 8 *half_double_crochet 37 times decrease turn *repeat 74 round 9-18 continue to work in the round with a half_double_crochet in every stitch until round 18 or you reach desired length weave in ends 74 finished size about 10 5 x 6 rise resist persist
